name: Get a shared template url
fullName: Marketing/Email Campaigns#Get a shared template url
description: Get a unique URL to share & import an email template from one Sendinblue account to another.
descriptionHtml: Get a unique URL to share & import an email template from one Sendinblue account to another.
statusMessage: Response has the required fields, Code and message should be empty strings, Shared URL is a non-empty string, SharedUrl is a valid URL format
